name: Goblin Tunnels
description:
Hi there. This is my first game I created on my own. I took the Unity course Create with Code and wanted to make a game using what I learned from the course. Hope you have fun with it. 

Controls: 

Use arrows or WASD to move sideways or change your speed. 

Spacebar to roll bombs

I will be taking more online game dev courses and hopefully be creating bigger and more complex games.
